entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 9:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023
Temperature: 5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 4.7°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Haro Strait early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early in the morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Haro Strait late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Haro Strait in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023
